snippet.title: The Medium - PlayStation 5 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Medium is coming to PlayStation 5! On September 3, you will discover a dark mystery that only a medium can solve. But there's more exciting news for all fans of The Medium!

In partnership with leading global publishing partner Koch Media, we have announced The Medium will hit retail stores worldwide. From September 3, the game will be available in a physical format for PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5™, while The Medium: Two Worlds Special Launch Edition - which comes with an exclusive SteelbookTM, original soundtrack, and a 32 page hardcover artbook - will launch on the same day in selected territories.

The Medium is a third-person psychological horror game that features innovative dual-reality gameplay. Players assume the role of Marianne, a medium gifted with several psychic abilities, and explore the real and spirit world both alternatively and simultaneously to uncover a dark mystery masked by disturbing secrets, sinister spirits, and devious puzzles only a medium can solve.

Official page: https://www.themediumgame.com

FB: https://www.facebook.com/MediumGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheMediumGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the_medium_

#TheMediumGame #BlooberTeam #PlayStation5
